## [1.5.1] - 2020-03-13_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Deprecated_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- **THIS MODULE HAS BEEN DEPRECATED**. It will no longer be released. Please use_x000D__x000A_ the following modules instead:_x000D__x000A_ - The resource `xIEEsc` have been replaced by `IEEnhancedSecurityConfiguration`_x000D__x000A_ in the module [ComputerManagementDsc](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc)._x000D__x000A_ - The resource `xUac` have been replaced by `UserAccountControl`_x000D__x000A_ in the module [ComputerManagementDsc](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc)._x000D__x000A_ - The resource `xFileSystemAccessRule` have been replaced by `FileSystemAccessRule`_x000D__x000A_ in the module [FileSystemDsc](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileSystemDsc)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixes issue with importing composite resources ([issue #34](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xSystemSecurity/issues/34))._x000A__x000A_## [1.5.0] - 2020-01-29_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xSystemSecurity_x000D__x000A_ - Added continuous delivery with a new CI pipeline._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xSystemSecurity_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed the correct URL on status badges._x000D__x000A_- xFileSystemAccessRule_x000D__x000A_ - Corrected flag handling so that the `Test-TargetResource` passes_x000D__x000A_ correctly._x000D__x000A_ - Using `Ensure = 'Absent'` with no rights specified will now correctly_x000D__x000A_ remove existing ACLs for the specified identity, rather than silently_x000D__x000A_ leaving them there._x000D__x000A_ - Correctly returns property `Ensure` from the function `Get-TargetResource`._x000A__x000A_## [1.4.0.0] - 2018-06-13_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Changes to xFileSystemAccessRule_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed issue when cluster shared disk is not present on the server_x000D__x000A_ ([issue #16](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xSystemSecurity/issues/16))._x000D__x000A_ [Dan Reist (@randomnote1)](https://github.com/randomnote1)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_#_x000A__x000A_## [1.3.0.0] - ## [1.5.1] - 2020-03-13_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Deprecated_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- **THIS MODULE HAS BEEN DEPRECATED**. It will no longer be released. Please use_x000D__x000A_ the following modules instead:_x000D__x000A_ - The resource `xIEEsc` have been replaced by `IEEnhancedSecurityConfiguration`_x000D__x000A_ in the module [ComputerManagementDsc](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc)._x000D__x000A_ - The resource `xUac` have been replaced by `UserAccountControl`_x000D__x000A_ in the module [ComputerManagementDsc](https://github.com/dsccommunity/ComputerManagementDsc)._x000D__x000A_ - The resource `xFileSystemAccessRule` have been replaced by `FileSystemAccessRule`_x000D__x000A_ in the module [FileSystemDsc](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileSystemDsc)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixes issue with importing composite resources ([issue #34](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xSystemSecurity/issues/34))._x000A__x000A_## [1.5.0] - 2020-01-29_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xSystemSecurity_x000D__x000A_ - Added continuous delivery with a new CI pipeline._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xSystemSecurity_x000D__x000A_ - Fixed the correct URL on status badges._x000D__x000A_- xFileSystemAccessRule_x000D__x000A_ - Corrected flag handling so that the `Test-TargetResource` passes_x000D__x000A_ correctly._x000D__x000A_ - Using `Ensure = 'Absent'` with no rights specified will now correctly_x000D__x000A_ remove existing ACLs for the specified identity, rather than silently_x000D__x000A_ leaving them there._x000D__x000A_ -
